articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Avalanche traps 42 workers under snow near India-Tibet border - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Strong winds and blocked roads hinder rescue mission for 42 workers caught in Uttarakhand avalanche.
articles.content:
More than 40 construction workers are trapped under the snow due to an avalanche near Indias border with Tibet.
Blizzard-like conditions caused the avalanche on Friday at a camp near the mountain vi… [+2038 chars]
